sentences.sContent: You’d better go and see the quack with that burn.
sentences.sCn: 你最好去找医生看看那处烧伤。

sentences.sContent: There were ducks quacking on the lawn.
sentences.sCn: 有鸭子在草坪上发出嘎嘎的叫着。

words.tran: 庸医的医术；骗子的行为

trans.tranOther: When a duck quacks, it makes the noise that ducks typically make
relating to the activities or medicines of someone who pretends to be a doctor
